name: Napoleonfacts
0:
”Alexa, open Napoleon facts”
”Alexa, launch Napoleon facts”
”Alexa, start Napoleon facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: napoleon facts
des:
- Enjoy Napoleon and Napoleonic knowledge with interesting facts about the French Leader, and learn more about Napoleon’s direct influence on modern countries like the USA, Germany, the Netherlands and more, to enhance your knowledge of French history.
- History and trivia buffs will want to try this one. You will get interesting information about a wide range of Napoleon facts, from law and history, to life, art, and war-related events.
- Even Napoleon enthusiasts may learn a few new things about Napoleon Bonaparte.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
